pages.text: The scent of $(item)Risium$() reminds of times of struggle，of past times，even the lucky times.$(br)And then we $(marked)laugh$().$(br2)Meditating near it might bring the deepest memories，and cause the greatest elation.

To create Risium plants，a $(l:vitalis/entry_seed)Dormant Seed$() must be consumed under $(marked)laughter$()。The person consuming the seed must be in the $(marked)Overworld$().$(br2)$(o)W h e e z e$()
